name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Chester DILL, Appellant

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
O’BRIEN, J., did not participate in the decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Chester DILL, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM.
The Judgment of Sentence is affirmed.
O’BRIEN, J., did not participate in the decision of this case.
Appellant argued that the negotiated plea was not knowingly entered.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Raymond J. Takiff, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Ann C. Lebowitz, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
398 A.2d 644
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Chester DILL, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Jan. 8, 1979.
Decided March 14, 1979.
Raymond J. Takiff, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Ann C. Lebowitz, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
